metadata.dc:author: Buesa Muñóz, F P
López Abraham, A M
Jiménez Misas, C A
metadata.dc:description: A variation of the components of media used by Lassen for the identification of clinically significant gram-negative bacilli is performed in pursuit of an economically accessible method that can be introduced in daily laboratory work.
metadata.dc:title: Modificación del método de Lassen para la identificación de bacilos gramnegativos.
[Modified Lassen's method for the identification of gram negative bacilli].
